There once was a woman named Mary. Mary's best friend was a dog named Buddy. Mary and
ewlineBuddy went everywhere together. They had a lot in common. They both liked to play games
ewlinelike fetch and hide and seek. Neither of them liked to take a bath. Mary and Buddy enjoyed
ewlinesmelling flowers and eating hamburgers. But they also were very different from one
ewlineanother. For one thing, Buddy was a dog! Buddy liked talking to strangers and visiting new
ewlineplaces. But Mary was shy. One day a man named John came by. Mary hid behind a tree when
ewlineshe saw him. Buddy tried to tell her it was okay, but she was too scared to listen. So
ewlineBuddy went out to say hello to John. John was very nice and he liked the same games as
ewlineBuddy. Mary watched Buddy chase after a ball John threw. She could tell John was a nice
ewlineman. She wanted to play too. Buddy saw her watching and led his new friend over to
ewlineMary. John waved to Mary and brought her a flower. Mary smiled at him. She thought he was
ewlinevery kind and she wasn't as nervous as before. Buddy barked happily. Yay for new friends!
